name: ChickenGuideSimulator3000
description:
Ever wanted to save a chicken? Here is your chance to do so.

Perform your all-mighty chicken call to catch its attention and make it follow you.

https://giphy.com/gifs/YmWDcPapfrQQwNf6sh/html5

Spacebar/A - Call the Chicken
ASDW/Analog Stick - Walking

Press A on a second controller to join Player 2

Made for Ludum Dare 46
